text: Hagi mika kna zage hanati kaziga kuma kafantera 6si'a huzmantege'za kegava hutere hu'naze. Hagi noti kazigane, sauti kazigane kuma kafantera kegavama hanaza vahera 4'a huzmantetere hige'za kegava hu'naze. Hagi fenoma ante nontaminte'ma, kegava hania vahera tare huzmantetere hige'za kegava hu'naze.
